resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** M. E. Brown, C. A. Trujillo, D. L. Rabinowitz
 **Discovery date:** January 5, 2005
 **Minor planet category:** dwarf planet, TNO, plutoid, and SDO
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 10.12 billion km (67.6 AU)
 **Aphelion:** 14.60 billion km (97.6 AU)
 **Perihelion:** 5.65 billion km (37.8 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.442
 **Orbital period:** 557 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 3.436 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 44.187°
 **Satellites:** 1 (Dysnomia)
==Physical characteristics== **Mean radius:** 1300 +200 −100 km (2007), preliminary: ≤1170 (2010)
 **Mass:** 1.67×10^^22^^ kg
 **Mean density:** 2.25–2.5 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** ~0.8 m/s²
 **Sidereal rotation period:** > 8h?
 **Albedo:** 0.86 ± 0.07
 **Surface temp:** 30K(min) 42.5K(mean) 55 K(max)
 **Spectral type:** B-V=0.78, V-R=0.45


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eris_(dwarf_planet)|wikipedia]].
